"We have seen what children do. Just like you. 

Now let's transport you to a world of imagination.

Where strange things happen in this world. When the world starts looking very different from what we see. 

Can you imagine such a world? But this different world is not imagination alone. It is very real. 

You must be scratching your head to think what are we talking about.

Curious? Let's watch."
You can listen to the story again by clicking on the Play button.
